mapper.select: SELECT no,goods_name,goods_poster,goods_price,goods_delivery,hit,likecount,replycount,num FROM (SELECT no,goods_name,goods_poster,goods_price,goods_delivery,hit,likecount,replycount,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,goods_name,goods_poster,goods_price,goods_delivery,hit,likecount,replycount FROM goods_all ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
